item.content:
Gonna pick up this project again. I have an idea on making a “Brain” system I can just drag and drop into NPCs. Here’s the Eye/tracking system

+Added NPC sight system

Different Eyes! Example 1

Planning for other NPC brain power. Sight is ooonly the beginning! I have an idea to add Hearing, and Memory. Memory will be really useful for when the NPC can walk. For example, enemy NPCs will remember common paths a player takes and could possibly ambush them.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi I’m Hex n I’m from the US! I also go by Hexa if there’s another “Hex” present. I am a “jack-of-all-trades” meaning i specialize in many different skills, such as digital and traditional art, 3d modeling, coding, story telling, and game making. I don’t have much going on in my life, but at the moment I’m majoring in bio-chemistry so I can eventually be an anesthesiologist. Thanks for checking out my blog
